scripts.cc:start: f() { npm run cc:package; npm run cc:install carinsurance; }; f
scripts.cc:upgrade: f() { npm run cc:package; hurl upgrade carinsurance node $1  -P ./chaincode-carinsurance; }; f
scripts.cc:start:oracle: f() { npm run cc:package; npm run cc:install convoracle; }; f
scripts.cc:upgrade:oracle: f() { npm run cc:package; hurl upgrade convoracle node $1  -P ./chaincode-convoracle; }; f
scripts.cc:package: f() { npm run lerna:build; chaincode-manager --update --config ./carinsurance.config.json --output ./chaincode-carinsurance package; chaincode-manager --update --config ./convoracle.config.json --output ./chaincode-convoracle package; }; f
